snippet: The case of two high school football stars drew wide attention for the way social media spurred the initial prosecution and later helped galvanize national outrage over the episode.
abstract: Steubenville, Ohio, high school football stars Trent Mays and Ma'lik Richmond are found guilty of raping 16-year-old girl in case that has drawn national attention for way social media spurred initial prosecution and later helped galvanize national outrage.
lead_paragraph: The case of two high school football stars drew wide attention for the way social media spurred the initial prosecution and later helped galvanize national outrage over the episode.

headline.seo: 2 Teenagers Found Guilty in Steubenville, Ohio, Rape
headline.main: Ohio Teenagers Guilty in Rape That Social Media Brought to Light
headline.print_headline: Ohio Teenagers Guilty in Rape That Social Media Brought to Light
